Question: In March 2009, this person was announced as the new face of clothing brand Candie's.
Hints: In July 2004, this person became engaged to American dancer Kevin Federline, whom she had met three months before.
In July 2008, this person regained some visitation rights after coming to an agreement with Federline and his counsel.
The song later became this person's sixth number one single on the UK Singles Chart and peaked at #3 on US Billboard Hot 100.
